30: unobtrusive as possible.

35: In approximately two weeks' time a few changes are going to come into effect.
37: Firstly, a bug allowing players to carry a lot more scrolls than their skills would otherwise permit will be fixed.  We advise you to scale back on the number of
38: scrolls that you carry before that time.  While exploding scrolls will no longer kill you, there will be other penalties.
40: Secondly, the guild point cost of broomstick flights is going to be changed from 200 guild points per flight, to 100 guild points.  The number of guild points you can
41: store in your broom at any one time will also be reduced accordingly.
43: Last, but certainly not least, the guild point cost of several rituals will be reduced where the cost seemed disproportionate to the effect.  This includes divine hand,
44: where the base guild point cost (no passengers, just the performer) will be reduced to 100 guild points.  Each passenger will (as it does now) incur an additional cost
45: of 50 guild points.
